title: Bug 122105 - Schema name should be included in the stored procedure name when used in QueryText
description: Bug 122105 - The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using a stored procedure.
OB: In the 'Edit data set' window, when a stored procedure is dragged into the QueryText field, the stored procedure name does not include the database schema name.
EB: The stored procedure name in the QueryText field should be composed of the database schema name and the stored procedure name.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new report. 
2. Open the 'Edit data set' window. 
3. Drag a stored procedure into the QueryText field.
